title: Rhythm in athletics
brief_description: This film is designed to stimulate interest in, and appreciation of, all types of track and field events. It aims to motivate pupils in athletics where the rhythm and beauty of the activities predominate, without emphasis on competition. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
